objects.description: [Contagious Interview](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1052) has developed malware that utilizes Qt cross-platform framework to include [BeaverTail](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1246).(Citation: ESET Contagious Interview BeaverTail InvisibleFerret February 2025)(Citation: PaloAlto Unit42 ContagiousInterview BeaverTail InvisibileFerret October 2024)
